document_data.name: ''Raeranthur's Cloak''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|94}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Raeranthur's Cloak''''' was one of the treasures in the [[Vault of Ages]].
document_data.Powers: Wrapping the cloak around a tree's trunk banished any blights on the plant. It could also banish blights from other plants it was draped over.
document_data.History: ''Raeranthur's Cloak'' was in the [[Vault of Ages]] as of {{yearlink|241}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|132|6}}
